article.headline: St. Peter's 90, Niagara 86
article.story: JERSEY CITY, N.J. -- Nick Leon scored a career-high 29 points and Wesley Jenkins added 27 in Saint Peter's 90-86 double overtime win over Niagara on Monday night. Leading 82-81 with 2:02 left in the second overtime period, the Peacocks (8-8, 3-3 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference) scored five straight to pull away. Leon capped the spurt on a three-point play for an 87-81 lead with 41 seconds remaining. It was Saint Peter's first double overtime game since defeating Niagara 106-103 in 1999. Darius Conley had 13 points, and Ryan Bacon tallied 12 points and career-highs with 16 rebounds and seven assists for the Peacocks. Saint Peter's led 74-71 with 22 seconds left in regulation before Tyrone Lewis tied it on a 3-pointer with 16 seconds remaining. Lewis finished with 27 points and Bilal Benn had 16 points and 11 rebounds for the Purple Eagles (10-8, 3-3).

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
